response.original_title: The Beginning & End of Marvelous Girl
response.overview: It's the beginning. A storebought pieced together costume combines with a naive enthusiasm and lack of understanding. After one of her first nights on self-induced "patrol", Marvelous ends up collaring three nefarious criminals. The three meet in jail, compare notes and decide to take care of this threat immediately. The very next night at a closed down bar, Marvelous shows up to an inevitable trap. Too naive to realize she's in real danger, Marvelous takes the bait, falls for the trap, and egotistically continues the confrontation instead of running. It's all downhill as Marvelous quickly gets indoctrinated to the criminal underworld. Does she survive? Find out in BEMG.
response.title: The Beginning & End of Marvelous Girl
